name: African Big Game Hunting
description:
Get into the immersive world of an African big game hunt! Scout for elephants, giraffe, zebra, lions, and more! Ride through wild African terrain in pursuit of some of the most sought after exotic animals and experience it all as if you were there.

The animals include :
A lion, tiger cheetah, elephant, giraffe, zebra, wildebeast, hyena, rhino, crocodile, gazelle, water buffalo, vulture and more! Add them to your collection as you work to take each one down without getting taken out yourself!
